mapper.select: SELECT EMINO, EMIIMAP, EMIIMAPPORT, EMISMTP, EMISMTPPORT, EMIUSER, EMIPW, EMI.USERNO, USERNM FROM EML_MAILINFO EMI INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON EMI.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE EMI.DELETEFLAG='N' AND EMI.USERNO=#{userno} ORDER BY EMINO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EML_MAILINFO(EMIIMAP, EMIIMAPPORT, EMISMTP, EMISMTPPORT, EMIUSER, EMIPW, USERNO, ENTRYDATE, DELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{emiimap}, #{emiimapport}, #{emismtp}, #{emismtpport}, #{emiuser}, #{emipw}, #{userno}, NOW(), 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT EMINO, EMIIMAP, EMIIMAPPORT, EMISMTP, EMISMTPPORT, EMIUSER, EMIPW, EMI.USERNO, USERNM FROM EML_MAILINFO EMI INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON EMI.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE EMI.EMINO=#{emino}
